pages.text: $(li)The Smoker is a variant of the $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/furnace)Furnace$(/l) specialized in cooking.$(br)$(li)The Smoker is twice as fast as the common Furnace.
$(li)To use it you have to place this block and right click on it.
$(li)Then you need to place the item to cook in the first slot.$(br)$(li)Now you have to insert the Fuel in the second slot.

pages.title: Fuel Items
pages.text: $(li)Wood$(li)$(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/charcoal)Charcoal$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/coal)Coal$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/coal_block)Coal Block$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/lava_bucket)Lava Bucket$(/l)$(li)$(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/blaze_rod)Blaze Rod$(/l)$(li)Blaze Lantern.$(br2)$(li)After a few seconds you can pick up the result and add it into your inventory.
